title: (x) Geometric sans numerals - ITC Kabel {Mark S}
content:
Help would be greatly appreciated.   
   
Hildebrant. ![Numbers](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054637im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68873.jpg)
author: hildebrant

comments.content:
[Geometric 415 black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054637/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/geometric-415/black/testdrive.html?s=3685&p=72) is the closest I can find.   
   
You could also look at Avenir Black, or Futura Bold.

I know, I can't figure this out. That 6 is throwing me.   
   
Hildebrant.
Dang, I looked at Kabel too but not the ITC version.
I can't see any numbers. Can anyone suggest why? I'm using Firefox on a Mac.

Neither can I. (I'm on Mozilla 1.6 Mac.) I also have a similar problem with this recent thread:   
   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68862.html?1112734731](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054637/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68862.html?1112734731)   
   
Both images display fine in Safari, for what it's worth.   
   
s'marks

Ditto Stuart's two images. Can't see 'em.   
Internet Explorer 6 in Windows.

Hah!   
   
That emoticon is pretty cool (and obvious) once you figure it out, Tiffany.

_darkside..._   
   
Don't you mean "join the rebellion," Tiffany? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054637im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Yeah, this is one of the few places where **I** feel like the rebel.

CMYK VS RGB, may be the problem for not seeing the images in various browsers..   
_( Soo, If those posting requests on Typophile could please make sure that their samples are in RGB, rather than in CMYK.. )_

Makes sense, Dav. CMYK JPEGs make the image   
unviewable for everybody on the MyFonts Forum.

Oops, I had no idea I saved it as CMYK, ohh well.   
Thanks for all the help guys (and gals).   
   
Hildebrant.com
